title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dinesh D’Souza & Catherine Engelbrecht | 10/8/20
description:
VP Mike Pence destroyed Sen. Kamala Harris last night, but did the media see the same vice presidential debate? While the media covers for Kamala Harris who dodged the question about packing the Supreme Court and fracking, Glenn has the real facts. Filmmaker Dinesh D’Souza discusses the debate and the possibility of “cultural secession” if Biden wins. True the Vote’s Catherine Engelbrecht shows a great tool to see for yourself how the Left is changing voting rules.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
